text: Tyrone Clarence Fahner (November 18, 1942 â€“ September 16, 2024) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was the Illinois Attorney General from 1980 until 1983. He was appointed to the role by Governor James R. Thompson. Fahner died in Northfield, Illinois on September 16, 2024, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Illinois attorneys general Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:Politicians from Evanston, Illinois Category:Lawyers from Evanston, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Tyrone C. Fahner
